Posts.Content: Dec 27, 2012 03:47AM CrystalAnn wrote: Jubby, I had a BMX with tissue expanders on September 27th (5 1/2 hour surgery) and it took me a full eight weeks to feel like my "old self." I felt significantly better around week three or so, but the fatigue and stamina issues lingered for a long time. Be patient and kind to yourself. Your body went through a lot of trauma, and it needs to rest and heal. I thought I would feel terrible forever, but before I knew it three months went by and I feel great! Take it day-by-day, and know that soon you will have more good days than bad. it will happen, I promise!
Posts.Title: very tired and spacey after surgery Jubby Jubby
